item.title: Dev Notes
item.description:
Java Spring Boot

April 13, 2025

Java Spring Boot (Login-function)

What I worked on: Tried to center a div. That’s it. Sounds simple, right? Nope.

What went wrong: I tried margin: auto, then flexbox, then grid. Somehow, it still didn’t look right on mobile.

What I learned: Viewport units can mess with your layout if you’re not careful. Also: never trust a div.

Next Steps: Look into responsive design best practices. Maybe try Tailwind CSS.
